conclusion: Analyze layout of containers and flow path to determine liquid flow after passing through baffles.
Image shows containers A, B, C, D at top, connected by channels leading downward to containers E and F at bottom, with baffles directing flow.
Liquid from A and B moves leftward, liquid from C and D moves rightward.
Channels leading to E receive liquid from A and B, channels leading to F receive liquid from C and D.
E is positioned to the left and F to the right, liquid from A and B flows into E, liquid from C and D flows into F.
